column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A man was arrested after an incident occurred at about 6:30 pm on Tuesday
column10: current address is Trapeang Po Village
column14: along with a large knife.------The victim was staying in a rented room with another sister
column15: while the suspect was staying in a rented room about 20 meters away. Before the incident
column16: the victim slept in the room without locking the door.------Seeing an opportunity
column17: the suspect jumped into the room Intention to rape the victim. But because the victim’s sister came out of the bathroom screaming and the victim fought with the suspect
column18: who was apparently armed with a large blade.------The authorities immediately arrived at the scene and took the suspect for questioning. ------AREY
